parse: Verb - Perfect Participle Active - Nominative Masculine Plural

str2: Neuter of hostis as conjunction; demonstrative, that; causative, because.
Lord, master, sir; the Lord. From kuros; supreme in authority, i.e. controller; by implication, Master.

parse: Verb - Future Indicative Middle - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From a primary komeo; properly, to provide for, i.e. to carry off.
Each (of more than two), every one. As if a superlative of hekas; each or every.

parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Accusative Neuter Singular
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.

parse: Verb - Aorist Subjunctive Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: (a) I make, manufacture, construct, (b) I do, act, cause. Apparently a prolonged form of an obsolete primary; to make or do.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
(a) (as adj.) enslaved, (b) (as noun) a (male) slave. From deo; a slave.
And if, whether. From ei and te; if too.
Free, delivered from obligation. Probably from the alternate of erchomai; unrestrained, i.e. not a slave, or exempt.
